column5: 2 mi. N. of TWU, 3 mi. from the City of Denton, downtown. Close to shopping, restaurants, coffee shops, Water Works, and schools. Walking distance to trails, parks, and public library. New carpet (5/23/2017). Queen-sized bed. Full bath may be private if no one is staying in the bedroom across the hall. The bathroom is the only room sharing a wall with this bedroom. I have 2 bedrooms available; the other a single bed ($25). Quiet neighborhood.
column8: Queen bed; split floor plan; next to bath
